question:
Consider the following statements about INS Kalvari that was recently in news:
  1. It is India’s first indigenous scorpene-class submarine
  2. It has been commissioned under a venture called Project 75
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. INS Kalvari is India’s first indigenous scorpene-class submarine being built at Mazagon Dock Shipbuilders Limited (MDL) in Mumbai. <u>Second statement is also correct</u>. Kalvari was built indigenously under a venture called Project 75, at Mumbai’s Mazagon Docks. Under this project, the Indian Navy is authorised to build six submarines in collaboration with French firm DCNS at a cost of around Rs 350 crore.
